snippet: A $48 billion deal that would create the nation’s largest health insurer inched closer to completion after shareholders of both Anthem and Cigna voted in favor of a buyout.
abstract: Anthem and Cigna shareholders approve buyout deal; agreement moves insurance companies closer to completing $48 billion merger, which would create nation’s largest healthcare insurer.
lead_paragraph: A $48 billion deal that would create the nation’s largest health insurer inched closer to completion after shareholders of both Anthem and Cigna voted in favor of a buyout.

headline.print_headline: Shareholders at Anthem and Cigna Approve Merger
headline.main: Shareholders at Anthem and Cigna Approve Merger
